donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: By mid 2010, the vulnerable Roma and Egyptian Communities in Fier, Tirana  and Elbasan are better able to access social and public services and the labour market as well as participate in local decision-making and have improved awareness on health, education and child protection, while Government is better able to implement and monitor plans targeting social inclusion of vulnerable communities.

project_descr: Empowering the Local Communities of Albania
